articles.author: Chris Morris
articles.title: Coronavirus catch-up: Latest news on the outbreak of the disease
articles.description: Cases soar in China, as U.S. infections increase.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: ‘Tip of the iceberg:’ Why Covid-19 deaths will keep rising even as the coronavirus outbreak wanes
articles.description: Across China, more than 1,300 people have died from the virus and more than 59,000 have been infected, according to authorities.

articles.author: Erika Fry
articles.title: In business vs. coronavirus, coronavirus is winning
articles.description: The global coronavirus outbreak could cost the global economy between $90 billion and $270 billion.

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: ‘Surpassing all previous outbreaks’—markets dip as the coronavirus toll worsens
articles.description: Economists are calculating anywhere from a 0.2 percentage-point drop to as much as 1% fall, the kind of downward revision that could be felt across the globe.

articles.author: eamonbarrett
articles.title: Business’s coronavirus conundrum: What’s the best alternative to a handshake?
articles.description: Business leaders used to sealing deals with a handshake are scrambling for other options.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: Why coronavirus cases in one Chinese province surged 45% overnight
articles.description: The province alone now has nearly 50,000 infected patients.
